lexUnit.name: blink.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: shut and open the eyes quickly.

sentence.text: His eyes blinked violently in a spasm that screwed up his face in rapid jerks .
The grey eyes blinked , small and frightened .
Flat toadlike eyes blinked , watering .
Maxham 's pale grey eyes blinked .
She could feel them welling up behind her eyes , and she blinked rapidly , trying to refocus on how much she hated him instead of how much he was hurting her .
The Grand Duke 's eyes blinked nervously .
Marx blinked his bloodshot eyes .
Rabbits ( and humans for that matter ) blink their eyes in response to an air puff directed towards the cornea .
She blinked at him with eyes narrowed by the fat around them .
Then he blinked his eyes nervously , and said : ` Yes ? "
Ruth blinked open her eyes and stared at him .
Cranston blinked to hide his tears and grinned over at Athelstan .
He blinked to make sure he was n't dreaming , but the Bookman was still standing there when he opened his eyes .
She blinked artificial eyelashes over wide , brown eyes that were smarting from the vanity of contact lenses .
Neither blinked an eyelid .
It seems to us so extraordinary , yet the storyteller does not blink an eyelid .
Donald blinked several times , then took off his glasses .
Old Herkimer blinked his eye and nodded wisely .
Over on one side , Lars Ulrich blinked his fashionably painted eyelids whilst he calculated moments of inertia and angular velocities on the wax tablet he always carried with him .
Cranston belched and blinked at Athelstan .
Shiona blinked at him .
Lisa blinked at him .
She blinked at me for a minute or two and then said , ` Aliens ! "
Cassowary blinked in astonishment .
Patrick blinked in astonishment .
Father Poole blinked in dismay .
Rory blinked in surprise .
She blinked with confusion .
Blanche blinked with surprise .
He blinked with surprise .
The question was direct and he blinked for a moment before answering : ` Yes , " he said , ` honestly yes , I will .
Dorcas blinked back at her , his mind racing .
He blinked up at her from his grimy face , and said flatly , ` Ha'p'orth . "
The old man blinks up through milky , uncomprehending eyes as the father , leaning over the table on knuckled hands , spits out his loathing in a voice too low to be overheard .
Lisa blinked up at him , for a moment wondering if he was joking , but there was not a shadow of humour in the dark eyes that met her own .
He blinked up at the light .
Marcus blinked up at the screw .
Gimmelmann blinked around the table , nodding greetings to Richard and Penny .
He blinked again and shivered from head to toe .
Leonora blinked hard as she forced a smile .
The old man blinked rapidly , which Wycliffe was soon to recognise as a substitute for nodding .
Lin Foh blinked , quite astonished at being spoken to so sharply .
After staring for a moment , Schaffer straightened and blinked .
Lissa blinked , momentarily distracted .
Sophie blinked , startled at the way in which Helen had read her thoughts .
Marx blinked his bloodshot eyes .
It was more , she blinked her eyes , as if roused out of a coma .
He glanced around slowly , blinking his eyes .
He blinked red rimmed eyes .
Cleo blinked her huge dark eyes slowly .
